scripts.postinstall: lerna exec -- yarn install && lerna run prepare
scripts.start: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --names 'REACT, react-autogen, GRAPHQL, graphql-autogen' -c 'blue.bold,gray,cyan.bold,gray' 'NODE_ENV=development yarn workspace graphql-app dev' 'yarn workspace graphql-app generate:graphqlcodegen -w' 'NODE_ENV=development yarn workspace graphql-server start' 'yarn workspace graphql-server generate:graphqlcodegen -w'
scripts.start:mock-prod: yarn build && ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --names 'REACT, GRAPHQL' -c 'blue.bold,cyan.bold' 'NODE_ENV=production cd packages/app && yarn start' 'NODE_ENV=production MOCK_API=on cd packages/server && yarn start'
